Reviews.Title: Finally a computer I can live with !
Reviews.Author: OldRaschal
Reviews.Content: After 5 different computers and only needing 1. A very nice Amazon rep. helped me in choosing a very nice and very fast computer. I would recommend this computer to anyone with the need for above average speed and the willingness to learn the Windows 8.1 o/s. I pay no attention to brand names on electronics' anymore. I am just happy with the stress free operation of this unit.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a good purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is a graduation gift so I just looked at the features which were pleasing  to me.  Chose this over many others.

Reviews.Title: Nice but need time to learn
Reviews.Author: Michael Branch
Reviews.Content: With the new look and feel (Windows 8), me and my family need time to learn and leverage all of the functionality this offers.
